H0.text: The Kuiper Belt is the source of short-period comets.

H1.text: The Milky Way is the source of shortâ€‘period comets.

H2.text: The Vesta belt is where short period comets come from.

H3.text: Photon belt is the source from which short-period comets come.

A4.text: Studies since the mid-1990s have shown that the belt is dynamically stable and that comets' true place of origin is the scattered disc.

A5.text: The scattered disc is now seen as the most likely point of origin for periodic comets.
